flawed_nl_solution:
Andrew received 100 x 1/5 = <<100*1/5=500/1>>500/1 stickers.
So, there were 100 - 500/1 = <<100-500/1=-400>>-400 stickers left.
Bill received -400 x 3/10 = <<-400*3/10=-120>>-120 stickers.
Therefore, Andrew gave away 500/1 + -120 = <<500/1+-120=380>>380 stickers.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 500/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
